Create video from script and PNGs

Source: R/create_videos.R
create_videos.Rd

Create video from script and PNGs

create_videos(course_status = NULL, voice = "Joanna",
  ffmpeg_opts = "-minrate 16M -vf \"scale=1200:720\"",
  divisible_height = FALSE, video_bitrate = "16M",
  audio_codec = NULL, verbose = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

course_status

output from check_course
voice

Voice to pass to ari_spin
ffmpeg_opts

ffmpeg options to pass to ari_spin
divisible_height

should heights be divisible? Advanced usage to pass to ari_spin
video_bitrate

video bitrate to enforce. Advanced usage to pass to ari_spin
audio_codec

audio codec to pass to ari_spin
verbose

Should diagnostic messages be printed
...

additional arguments passed to ari_spin

Value

A `data.frame` output from check_course

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
